title: ESCALATION: Furiosa completion failures on wo-bgv
description:
Status Report on wo-bgv (Modernize app):

ISSUE: Polecat furiosa reported COMPLETED twice, but work validation failed both times.

Timeline:
1. First attempt (furiosa-mkfwx6ay):
   - POLECAT_DONE received (hq-5vp)
   - Branch not found on remote
   - Closed orphaned MR wo-a8x
   
2. Second attempt (furiosa-mkfxc4tr):
   - POLECAT_DONE received (hq-uc2)
   - Polecat logs show successful commit cbdf0da and push
   - Branch polecat/furiosa-mkfxc4tr not found on remote
   - Closed orphaned MR wo-jka

Current State:
- wo-bgv: IN_PROGRESS (no work delivered)
- Furiosa session: STOPPED
- Furiosa worktree: REMOVED
- No polecats active in wobbla rig

Root Cause Hypothesis:
The polecat 'gt done' command appears to be cleaning up worktrees and reporting success before verifying the push succeeded. This may be a bug in the polecat completion protocol.

Recommendation:
1. Investigate why pushes are failing or being lost
2. Fix polecat completion to validate remote push before cleanup
3. Re-dispatch wo-bgv to a different polecat OR
4. Manually verify the git push succeeded and recover work if possible

Work appears completely lost - no commits on any branch.

title: RESOLVED: Root cause was misconfigured remote
description: Investigation complete. The issue was NOT a polecat bug - the wobbla rig's remote was pointing to gas-town-test.git instead of wobbla.git. Furiosa's work (commit cbdf0da) exists on branch polecat/furiosa-mkfxc4tr in the correct wobbla repo. I've fixed the remote and reopened MR wo-jka. Nudging refinery to process it.

Refinery processed merge successfully. Status: commit cbdf0da merged to master, GitHub issue #3 closed, convoy hq-cv-ddh7o complete (1/1), all 17 tests passing. No action needed.
